abstract.text: A class that describes the properties of a 3D-convolution operator.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Use an instance of this class is to add a 3D-convolution operator with desired properties to the graph.

abstract.text: Build, compile, and execute compute graphs utilizing all the different compute devices on the platform, including GPU, CPU, and Neural Engine.
The optimized representation of a compute graph of operations and tensors.
A class that consists of all the levers for compiling graphs.
A class that describes the properties of a 2D-convolution operator.
A class that describes the properties of a 3D-convolution operator.
